text: Schandmaul is a medieval folk rock band from Munich, Germany. They formed in 1998. The members right now are: Thomas Lindner, Birgit Muggenthaler, Anna Kränzlein, Martin Duckstein, Stefan Brunner, Matthias Richter. The first song (Teufelsweib) was recorded in 1998. In the following year they released their very first Album "Wahre Helden". In 2000, the Album "Von Spitzbuben und anderen Halunken" has been redorded and released. In 2001, the band was discorvered by a record label, which led to the rerelease of "Von Spitzbuben und Halunken". ==Discography== *Albums ** Wahre Helden (1999) ** Von Spitzbuben und anderen Halunken (2000) ** Narrenkönig (lit. Jester's King) (2002) ** Wie Pech & Schwefel (2004) ** Mit Leib und Seele (2006) ** Anderswelt (2008) ** Traumtänzer (2011) ** Unendlich (2014) ** Leuchtfeuer (2016) ** Artus (2019) *Live albums ** Hexenkessel (2003) ** Kunststück (2005) ** Sinnfonie (2009) *EPs ** Bin Unterwegs (June 2005) ** Kein Weg zu weit (February 24, 2006) *DVDs ** Hexenkessel (2003) ** Kunststück (2005) ** Sinnbilder (2008) ** Sinnfonie (2009) ** Schandfilm (2011) ==References== Category:1998 establishments in Germany Category:German rock bands Category:Folk metal bands Category:Musicians from Munich Category:Musical groups established in 1998 Category:1990s German music groups Category:2000s German music groups Category:2010s German music groups
title: Schandmaul
